si.title: OIC OIC අත්අඩංගුවට ගැනීම
body_lines: මැතිවරණ නීතිය උල්ලං of නය කිරීමේ වගකිවයුතු පොලිස් ස්ථානය කොළඹ උතුරු පොලිස් අපරාධ ශාඛාව විසින් අත්අඩංගුවට ගෙන තිබේ. රීල්

en.title: Arrest of Oic Oic
body_lines: The Kochchikkadai Police Station in charge of violating election law has been arrested by the Colombo North Police Crime Branch. Remble

summary_lines: Here's a summary of the text in approximately 200 characters:
Colombo North Police Crime Branch arrests officer from Kochchikkadai Police Station for election law violation.
